title: Supplementary Table 1: Comparisons of the clinical and laboratory features between SARS and MERS SARS 1-12 MERS 13-31
body:
Advanced age, male gender, comorbidities (eg: DM), high initial or peak LDH, high initial neutrophil count, and low initial CD4/CD8 lymphocyte counts at presentation.

Advanced age, male gender, comorbid illness (eg: obesity, DM, heart and lung diseases, and immunocompromising states), low serum albumin, concomitant infections, positive plasma MERS-CoV RNA.
